posts.post_content: Great card, especially in EDH. But is indestructibility really worth, the mana fixing off of [Chromatic Lantern](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Chromatic Lantern), or the creatures off [Keyrune](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Keyrune)s. Idk, maybe. It can't be [Abrupt Decay](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Abrupt Decay)ed which is nice.
